expo.name: HomeoFace
expo.description: Dünyanın ilk ve tek tuzlarla yüz tanıma uygulaması

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: HomeoFace need to use the camera for skin analysis which is the main purpose of this app.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: You may need to upload saved pictures to make your skin analysis.
